column5: Located in the prestigious neighborhood of Alamo Heights, walking steps from major museums, parks, restaurants, coffee shops and bakeries and just 5 minutes from Downtown, enjoy your own private modern bedroom with balcony, full bathroom inside the bedroom and TV with high speed WIFI. Common areas include a cozy colorful patio to enjoy a drink after a long day, kitchen, dining room and living room. We guarantee that there is no better location in San Antonio.   Bus stop in front of the house.
column8: ONE OF THE BEST LOCATIONS IN SAN ANTONIO
